message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a new algorithm for continual learning in artificial neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the algorithm involves compressing and sharing the representational space of the network, which relates to the areas of dimensionality reduction and feature extraction. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also evaluates the algorithm on image datasets, which suggests relevance to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories.
